## Zakres
- [ ] FE
- [ ] BE
- [ ] DevOps/CI

## Jak testować (Docker Compose)
- [ ] `docker compose up --build`
- [ ] FE: http://localhost:3000
- [ ] BE: http://localhost:4000/api
- [ ] Swagger: http://localhost:4000/api/docs

## Quality Gate
- [ ] lint (compose)
- [ ] typecheck (compose)
- [ ] test (compose)
- [ ] build (compose)

## Bezpieczeństwo
- [ ] brak sekretów w repo (np. `.env` w `.gitignore`)
- [ ] brak wrażliwych danych w logach

## Rollback
- [ ] revert commit / revert PR
